name: Dude Shoot'em
description:
This is one of my first attemps to develop a game by myself.

Trying to make a quick and dirty one level egoshooter for educaton

turned out to become one of my favorite hobbies, so I continued developing,

fixing bugs and think about a storyline.

But because I had so much fun playtesting, I decided to let people

with a heart for games play it.

In short; it's not ready, yet. There is a stable  first level to play and development continues
